website_summaries.verdict: Park-quality playground with a variety of fun activities, including a mini rock climbing wall.
pros: Swings have soft rubber grips to prevent pinching or catching
Made with weather-resistant plastic and powder-coated metal
Allows for several kids to play on it together at once
cons: You'll need to schedule delivery, and having a pro assemble it is recommended

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I only bought this to try and keep my kids out of the house long enough to seduce their mom. The 12 hours of assembly has not paid off yet, but I'm working on my game. She can't resist my sexy man charm forever.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Ladder is dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with the ladder on this playset. I purchased and assembled the lifetime adventure tower play set. It has been in use 3 times and 3 children have gotten hurt. The ladder is very dangerous. The angle doesn’t allow for the children to anticipate where to put their feet and they have all fallen through the bars. I will not use this ladder again as it is a dangerous situation. I am currently in contact with the company to see if there is an aIternative ladder or something the kids can use. I am happy with the rest of the playset however, I need this situation addressed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Parenting win
customer_reviews.text: After searching and comparing many swing sets, we found this on Amazon and were very pleased with the price. Our delivery experience was great and we live on a very busy road. Others have had different experiences. I’m sure it depends on who’s delivering. To be clear, ASSEMBLY WAS A BEAST. It took about 3 days for my husband with me helping when I could. Some spots definitely require multiple sets of hands. Order some beer and pizza and cash in favors from friends. Overall, worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jededelly0112

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Get a little help assembling, but this is far and away a better investment than the $700 flimsy wood playsets. Looks great, very sturdy and the whole family loves it? No splinters or fear of rotting. We just power wash and play.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W.

customer_reviews.title: Not too hard, seems like it will last.
customer_reviews.text: If you pay attention to the pictures and follow instructions this is pretty easy to assemble. I put it together by myself and it probably took 15hrs or so. There were some tricky spots and I needed someone's help maybe two or three times. Seems really sturdy, not sturdy enough for large adults though. Got it Tuesday and finished it Saturday. Be careful not to tighten too much as you can crack the protective coat on the metal.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install.  Very durable. Weather beaten within first 3-4 months
customer_reviews.text: Hard to put together! Buy some therapy sessions when you purchase this because you and your significant other will want to divorce one another by the time your done and kids will never want another swing set! The instructions is literally a 90 page book! Took us about 3 days with 2 adults and 2 teens. But one the plus side it is a very sturdy and beautiful swingset. However it does get sunbeat rather quickly for the price😯
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 4 and 5 year old. Some of the best written assembly instructions and labeling on parts I have ever seen. Took husband and wife about 10 hours to assemble at a relaxed pace. Covered it on a Saturday. Glad we didn't spend another $400 for assembly service. Set is super sturdy, little boy loves the road tracks on the upper deck. Adults clambered all over, no wiggling or wobbling. Beautiful, superb quality product.
customer_reviews.author: AMS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The play structure is quite sturdy and nothing was damaged upon delivery. My daughter loves it. It wasn't extremely easy to put together, but no play structure is. Nothing was overly-complicated and the instructions were pretty easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great playground set...
customer_reviews.text: I had to pretty much build it by myself, which made it more difficult, but got it done with a little help for my wife. Took me like 3 day to complete, but once done looks great and very sturdy. 6yr and 3yr old love it.
customer_reviews.author: Firas-13

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price! This is a solid set - kids & adults can use this set with no problem. It's easy to keep clean & my son plays on it all the time. Assembly is a beast, though - it took 2 guys 2 full days to put it together (we had a 3rd for part of it).
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Great swing set for the price but not easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Finished product is sturdy and my grandkids love it! Very cumbersome to put together and some pieces didn’t line up, had to drill new holes
customer_reviews.author: P. Potter

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The swings are too close together. children swinging into each other. Looks much bigger than it actually is in the picture. Good quality, a bugger to put together, but disappointed in the size and space between tower and swings. Is there anything that can be added to expand that area?
customer_reviews.author: Debra Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Great swing set!
customer_reviews.text: Was missing a few nuts & bolts which made assembly take a little longer, but it's a great swing set. I like that it's all plastic & metal & it seems very durable. My kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: JJ Erick

customer_reviews.title: Got it all o er the rest, better than wood
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing it is well made. We have had it now 3 years, throughout summers, sub zero temps, and wind storms. It is still like new and well constructed. It is well worth the money, grandkids will love it. Yes an adult can swing on it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was packaged beautifully it arrived on time Great activity to put together with grandkids they LOVE it
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: What a quality product very nice but be patient lots of pieces ;)
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for large or older kids
customer_reviews.text: A Bit more assembly than anticipated but my handy man followed the instructions and it’s AMAZING High quality Strong and big enough for BIG kids and mom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This set is so worth the money! It's much bigger than our last wooden one and lots of kids can play at a time. Just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Prime member 1090

customer_reviews.title: The playset is great and perfect for our kids and our backyard
customer_reviews.text: The playset is great and perfect for our kids and our backyard. Only regret is hiring a company through Amazon Services to put the playset together as it was not good service. The actual playset is great and will get years of use!
customer_reviews.author: Stanley I. Thangaraj

customer_reviews.title: They color coded with shades of grey -_-
customer_reviews.text: My kids 5 & 2 love this product. Building took almost 16 hours. You really need two people and can blindly build luck. The instructions were not at all good. And some of the drill holes didn't match up. But all in all it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Alley

customer_reviews.title: Love this play set!!
customer_reviews.text: We do love this playset! Assembly was fairly straightforward, but we did notice that some of the bolts and screws were not labeled properly. The quality is excellent and the whole thing is very sturdy! I know we will enjoy it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Lee Hassler II

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build. Just a little time consuming. Wonderful product!! My son loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: ... a bit difficult to assemble but the grand kids love it. It appears to be made with high ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit difficult to assemble but the grand kids love it. It appears to be made with high quality components.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Haselhorst

customer_reviews.title: I love all products lifetime
customer_reviews.text: I love all products lifetime. So I had no doubts this would be a great purchase. I am not disappointed! My husband and I put this together in two different evenings. Instructions were easy and clear for us the understand. My kids love it, I have to beg them to come inside at night. Great purchase for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Munn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it snowing now so spring can play more.
customer_reviews.author: rob-idaho

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We are thrilled with this playset. It was only missing two bolts! A huge kudos to the direction writers, 7 hours, a husband and a pop pop and the job was finished. Leave the sleeves on the parts when shipped until you are ready to use them! My son loves this playset. At two he is a little short for the rockwall, but he can do it. The top is also a little scary for 2, buy bungee cords are a good reminder to beware of the openings.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Kircher

customer_reviews.title: Takes time to put together but a great
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Takes time to put together but a great product
customer_reviews.author: miguel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome swing set; kids love it. Assembly somewhat challenging but all worth it in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it- stairs a little scary for kids 3 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely high quality. Kids love it- stairs a little scary for kids 3 and under but the quality is definitely there. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Kaip

customer_reviews.title: you will greatly appreciate this purchase! Our kids (ages ...
customer_reviews.text: you will greatly appreciate this purchase! Our kids (ages 8,5,3,1) spend hours and hours on it. Simple to put together and directions were a breeze to follow. Slide is super-fast (watch the little ones).
customer_reviews.author: Book Depot

customer_reviews.title: ... us 2 days to put together but the kids loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Took us 2 days to put together but the kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Be aware. This thing is dropped off in a wooden crate the size of a small car by a tractor truck.....but it want have a forklift with them. Better hope you have a forklift or want it dropped in the road in front of your house. I mean literally dropped......as for the product, like all lifetime products it great and you can tell it will last.
customer_reviews.author: The Young's

customer_reviews.title: The playset itself is sturdy, quality materials and we are very happy with ...
customer_reviews.text: The playset took my husband and son two and a half days to put together - the only real problem they ran into was, after the tower was assembled and it was time to attach the slide and ladder they discovered the deck of the tower was oriented incorrectly. There was no information to indicate it had to go in a certain orientation so that holes could be drilled from underneath to attach the slide and ladder. They made it work by drilling holes and adjusting with bolts, etc. Otherwise, they would have had to disassemble the tower and start over. The playset itself is sturdy, quality materials and we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: SaC

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great quility
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great quility. Kids love it. Assembly was not bad and looks great. Very pleased as are the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Moore

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our kids, bought an infant swing separate. It took about 6 hours off and on to put the swing set together. So worth the money! I recommend this swingset to everyone looking.
customer_reviews.author: Nickko Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Very very very happy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband just put this up this past weekend. It took about 13.5 hours with occasional help from me. He took his time and thoroughly went over the directions before starting, which really helped. Our 3 and 1 year olds already love it and they only have played on it for 1 evening. We did a lot of research when it came to choosing a playset and we are 100% satisfied with what we chose. The playset came very well organized and looks overwhelming, but if you take your time, it is more time consuming than complicated! Definitely worth the purchase and unlike wood playset, this will continue to look great for years!!
customer_reviews.author: J & A's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great low maintenance play set!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome playset! Very easy for 2 people to put together in a day. Parts labeled and packaged to be easily identifiable. Quick shipping. Stakes down into ground. Heavy duty and will provide years of fun for my kids! And best of all little to no maintenance like a wooden set!
customer_reviews.author: cookie

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Searched and sampled multiple wooden/vinyl sets. Found this on Amazon and read through reviews. This set came curbside fully disassembled and the boxes and pieces were easy to drag/carry around back. Assembly took 7-8 hours with two average-skill dads. It feels very sturdy. We've had for a few months now and there is just a tiny bit of rust that is coming out of one of the bore holes in the main frame and the red "climbing wall hold" is faded pink. My 3yr old loves it and so do the neighbors'.
customer_reviews.author: ER Doc

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Other than delivery, I am very pleased with this product. The guy who showed up with the crate on his truck couldn't get it off. So we had to open the crate...I hand carried most of it to my garage. Installation was done in a day.. The instructions were easy to read. Installation went pretty smoothly. Started around 7am and worked while it was sprinkling, had to stop at 10am due to heavy rain. We already had the whole frame up. Started back at around 12 and worked until 430pm. It's almost done... I'm certain my son will be thrilled Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Tausha Knight

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love the playset
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love the playset. The only problem is with the ladder. I have a 3 year old grand daughter that has trouble with the ladder because of the distant between rungs. Contacted Lifetime to purchase more rungs to install and they would not sell me the parts!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: KAREN BEARDEN

product_meta.title: Lifetime Adventure Tower
feature_bullets: 1 Trapeze Bar, 2 Swings and 1 Spider Swing
Two sturdy 3-D climbing walls, 9-foot wavy slide
Arched climber, steering wheel, car map
Soft rubber grips on Swing chains to prevent pinching or snagging
